mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_unique_words(sentence):
    clean_sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence)
    word_list = clean_sentence.lower().split()
    word_count = Counter(word_list)
    word_count_list = [(k, v) for (k, v) in word_count.items()]
    unique_words = sorted(sorted(word_count_list), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return unique_words

import re
from collections import Counter

def count_unique_words(sentence):
    clean_sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', sentence)
    word_list = clean_sentence.lower().split()
    word_count = Counter(word_list)
    word_count_list = [(k, v) for (k, v) in word_count.items()]
    unique_words = sorted(sorted(word_count_list), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return unique_words

mutants.mutated_line: unique_words = sorted(sorted(word_count_list), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=False)

mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_unique_words(sentence):
    clean_sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sentence)
    word_list = clean_sentence.lower().split()
    word_count = Counter(word_list)
    word_count_list = [(k, v) for (k, v) in word_count.items()]
    unique_words = sorted(sorted(word_count_list), key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)
    return unique_words
